site_name: LAND AT WALDRAM CRESCENT TO THE REAR OF 1-17 STANSTEAD RD, WALDRAM CRESCENT, LONDON, SE23
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details of Construction Environmental Management Plan submitted in compliance with Condition (18) of planning permission (DC/20/116403) dated 10 September 2020 for an application submitted under Section 73 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 for minor material amendments to the planning permission DC/19/110957 dated 5 August 2019 for the erection of a building, rising to 6 storeys, comprising commercial floor space (Use Class A1/A2/A3/B1) and 22 dwellings above, with associated landscaping, disabled and cycle parking, servicing and refuse facilities at Land at Waldram Crescent to the rear of 1-17 Stanstead Rd, London, SE23 :- in order to include a nursery (Use Class D1),  re wording of Condition(s) (2), (8), (9), (10), (11), (12), (14), (15) & (16); Use of privacy glazing on Waldram Crescent (head to knee height rather than extending from floor to ceiling); Access doors from the commercial unit to the garden; Small windows added to the ground floor on the northwest elevation to provide additional daylight; Southeast corner re-configured to provide an external entrance lobby area, covered buggy store, bin store with street access and re-allocation of commercial/visitor cycle store; Internally, the two consented commercial units will be combined; and External landscape area to be re-allocated for commercial use.
